sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.isJavaObject</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Returns true if the given value is an instance of a Java object (as opposed to a JavaScript primitive, JavaScript object, null, or undefined).</description> <name>isJavaObject</name> <script><![CDATA[/* * Returns true if the given value is an instance of a Java object (as opposed to a JavaScript primitive, * JavaScript object, null, or undefined). */ isJavaObject = function(val) { return JSUtil.isJavaObject(val) }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>tom.dilatush</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2010-03-13 02:39:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>555ff41a0ab30157000c63af3f51431f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>isJavaObject</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_555ff41a0ab30157000c63af3f51431f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2013-01-09 18:56:40</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>224</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
